com.epam.finaltask.service

Class MessageService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.finaltask.service.AbstractService
      • com.epam.finaltask.service.MessageService

  • public class MessageService
extends AbstractService
    Provides manipulate to create, delete and manipulate Message entities.

      • MessageService

        Creates MessageService with default factories defined in AbstractService no-arguments constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • findTopicPageMessages

        public java.util.List<Message> findTopicPageMessages(long topicId,
                                                     int currentPage,
                                                     int numberOfMessagesPerPage)
                                              throws ServiceException
        Retrieves Message list on the chosen page from topic with chosen id from the database. Allows to get several topic messages sorted by date ascending. Number of maximum returned messages specified using numberOfMessagesPerPage parameter. Messages before chosen page are skipped, and won't be added to the result.
        Parameters:
        topicId - Id of the topic which messages will be retrieved
        currentPage - Current page number. Only messages starting from chosen page will be retrieved
        numberOfMessagesPerPage - Number of messages on each page
        Returns:
        List of messages
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • countMessages

        public int countMessages(long topicId)
                  throws ServiceException
        Returns database topic message count.
        Parameters:
        topicId - Id of the topic which messages will be counted
        Returns:
        Number of topic messages
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • findMessageById

        public Message findMessageById(long id)
                        throws ServiceException
        Retrieves message from the database by it's id. If message with chosen id does not exist, returns null.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the message to look for
        Returns:
        Message with chosen id, if it exists in the database, else null
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • deleteMessage

        public boolean deleteMessage(long messageId)
                      throws ServiceException
        Removes message from the database by id.
        Parameters:
        messageId - Id of the message to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if message successfully deleted, else returns false
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • createMessage

        public boolean createMessage(Account account,
                             long topicId,
                             java.lang.String text)
                      throws ServiceException
        Creates message with specified account, topicId and text and adds it to the database.
        Parameters:
        account - Account of the message author
        topicId - Id of the topic which owns message
        text - Text of the message
        Returns:
        true if message successfully created and added to the database, else returns false
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If PersistenceException is thrown while working with database
